Bash(/tmp/test-webhook.sh <<'EOF'
#!/bin/bash

echo "Testing ElevenLabs webhook endpoint..."
echo ""

curl -X POST https://landing-ai-alpha-five.vercel.app/api/elevenlabs/webhook/conversation-ended \\
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \\
  -d '{
    "conversation_id": "test_conv_123",
    "ended_at": "2026-01-31T14:30:00Z",
    "end_reason": "user_ended"
  }' \\
  -w "\\n\\nHTTP Status: %{http_code}\\n" \\
  -v 2>&1

echo ""
echo "If you see '[WEBHOOK] Conversation ended webhook received' in the response,"
echo "the endpoint is working correctly."
EOF)
